title: Russian Officials Flee Kherson as Russian Troops Dig In for a Battle
description: In Kherson, the first Ukrainian city to fall after the Russian invasion, occupation forces appear to be preparing to fight advancing Ukrainian troops.
dc:creator: Marc Santora and Eric Nagourney
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: In a heavily shelled schoolyard in the Kherson region, Ukrainian troops searched for explosives and booby traps on Monday.
